scripts.npm-release: npm run build; npm run test; npm-release
scripts.publish-next-version: npm run build; npm run test; export CURRENT_VERSION=$(node automation/set-next-version.js); npm i; git add .; git commit -m $CURRENT_VERSION; git push
scripts.test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --config jest.config.js test.js --testTimeout=50000 --detectOpenHandles
